Home1.subtitlefaq_page: Below FAQ are some common concerns of our clients before purchasing the theme, if you have other questions, please just send it to hello@cleversof.co
Home1.subtitlefaq_1: Will your template be fully compatible with Shopify?
Home1.subtitlefaq_2: I cannot upload the theme to my Shopify store / Shopify alerts that the file is too big to upload, what is the problem?
Home1.contentfaq_2:
1/ Download the package from themeforest.net (the file is in zip format)

2/ Extract the file you've just downloaded.

3/ Find this file from the extracted data: ione_theme_package_1_0_X.zip, then you just need to upload this file to your Shopify store.
Home1.subtitlefaq_3: What I have to do when I need your support?
Home1.contentfaq_3:
To save your time and reach our support quickly, please follow below steps:

1/ Create a staff account for us (with Themes permission and Settings permission) http://docs.shopify.com/manual/settings/account/staff-members

2/ Capture screenshot or video for the issue you get.

3/ Specify which template and version you are using.

4/ Describe clearly how to reproduce the issue.

5/ Send all information (staff account, screenshot, video, template name and version, description of the issues, link) to hello@cleversoft.co
Home1.subtitlefaq_4: Would assistance be available to upload the template if needed?
Home1.contentfaq_4: Yes, we will assist you to install the template if needed
Home1.subtitlefaq_5: Do you guys offer customisation services for your themes?
Home1.contentfaq_5: Yes, we do. Please send your customisation requests to hello@cleversoft.co, we will give you our quote. Thank you.
Home1.subtitlefaq_6: Can I turn on/off Lazy Loading Image / Item Animation / Fade Up on the page?
Home1.contentfaq_6: Yes. You can turn on/off the animation in the Setting page.
Home1.subtitlefaq_7: Can I turn on/off some blocks on the page?
Home1.contentfaq_7: Yes. You can turn on/off almost any blocks on the page (featured products, slideshow, banners, related products, recent products,...).
Home1.subtitlefaq_8: I want to have the dropdown cart displayed automatically every time clients hover over it (instead of clicking on it). Is it possible?
Home1.contentfaq_8: Yes, we have a setting for you to switch between these two options: Display on Hover and Display on Click.
Home1.subtitlefaq_9: What is included in the theme package?
Home1.contentfaq_9: The theme package includes theme source, Photoshop design files, sample data and manual guide.
Home1.subtitlefaq_10: I notice that the images used in the theme are all portrait. Will that be a problem if I use square images for our products? How will they be displayed in the theme?
Home1.contentfaq_10: That is not a problem. You just need to modify the width/height ratio in theme settings.
Home1.subtitlefaq_11: Does the theme support image resizing and cropping?
Home1.contentfaq_11: Yes. Normally, the theme will resize images to a default size (based on your width/height ratio setting). We also have Crop setting if you don’t want to scale the image.
Home1.subtitlefaq_12: Can I add borders around our product images?
Home1.contentfaq_12: Yes, you can. You can also set image border colours.
Home1.subtitlefaq_13: Can I have multi level menu?
Home1.contentfaq_13: Yes, you can. Just simply follow the instructions in our Manual Guide, you will be able to easily create a multi-level menu.
Home1.subtitlefaq_14: Do you guys provide customer support during weekends / holidays?
Home1.contentfaq_14: Normally we don't provide support during weekends, except for urgent cases. In these cases, you only need to mark “Urgent” in your email, we will get back to you ASAP.
Home1.subtitlefaq_15: Does the theme support Variant Image?
Home1.contentfaq_15: Yes, it does. Please check it out here to see how it works: https://ione-01.myshopify.com/products/30-degree-lamp?variant=26458864263

Home1.custom_tab_content:
Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.

Home2.subtitlefaq_page: Below FAQ are some common concerns of our clients before purchasing the theme, if you have other questions, please just send it to hello@cleversof.co
Home2.subtitlefaq_1: Will your template be fully compatible with Shopify?
Home2.subtitlefaq_2: I cannot upload the theme to my Shopify store / Shopify alerts that the file is too big to upload, what is the problem?
Home2.contentfaq_2:
1/ Download the package from themeforest.net (the file is in zip format)

2/ Extract the file you've just downloaded.

3/ Find this file from the extracted data: ione_theme_package_1_0_X.zip, then you just need to upload this file to your Shopify store.
Home2.subtitlefaq_3: What I have to do when I need your support?
Home2.contentfaq_3:
To save your time and reach our support quickly, please follow below steps:

1/ Create a staff account for us (with Themes permission and Settings permission) http://docs.shopify.com/manual/settings/account/staff-members

2/ Capture screenshot or video for the issue you get.

3/ Specify which template and version you are using.

4/ Describe clearly how to reproduce the issue.

5/ Send all information (staff account, screenshot, video, template name and version, description of the issues, link) to hello@cleversoft.co
Home2.subtitlefaq_4: Would assistance be available to upload the template if needed?
Home2.contentfaq_4: Yes, we will assist you to install the template if needed
Home2.subtitlefaq_5: Do you guys offer customisation services for your themes?
Home2.contentfaq_5: Yes, we do. Please send your customisation requests to hello@cleversoft.co, we will give you our quote. Thank you.
Home2.subtitlefaq_6: Can I turn on/off Lazy Loading Image / Item Animation / Fade Up on the page?
Home2.contentfaq_6: Yes. You can turn on/off the animation in the Setting page.
Home2.subtitlefaq_7: Can I turn on/off some blocks on the page?
Home2.contentfaq_7: Yes. You can turn on/off almost any blocks on the page (featured products, slideshow, banners, related products, recent products,...).
Home2.subtitlefaq_8: I want to have the dropdown cart displayed automatically every time clients hover over it (instead of clicking on it). Is it possible?
Home2.contentfaq_8: Yes, we have a setting for you to switch between these two options: Display on Hover and Display on Click.
Home2.subtitlefaq_9: What is included in the theme package?
Home2.contentfaq_9: The theme package includes theme source, Photoshop design files, sample data and manual guide.
Home2.subtitlefaq_10: I notice that the images used in the theme are all portrait. Will that be a problem if I use square images for our products? How will they be displayed in the theme?
Home2.contentfaq_10: That is not a problem. You just need to modify the width/height ratio in theme settings.
Home2.subtitlefaq_11: Does the theme support image resizing and cropping?
Home2.contentfaq_11: Yes. Normally, the theme will resize images to a default size (based on your width/height ratio setting). We also have Crop setting if you don’t want to scale the image.
Home2.subtitlefaq_12: Can I add borders around our product images?
Home2.contentfaq_12: Yes, you can. You can also set image border colours.
Home2.subtitlefaq_13: Can I have multi level menu?
Home2.contentfaq_13: Yes, you can. Just simply follow the instructions in our Manual Guide, you will be able to easily create a multi-level menu.
Home2.subtitlefaq_14: Do you guys provide customer support during weekends / holidays?
Home2.contentfaq_14: Normally we don't provide support during weekends, except for urgent cases. In these cases, you only need to mark “Urgent” in your email, we will get back to you ASAP.
Home2.subtitlefaq_15: Does the theme support Variant Image?
Home2.contentfaq_15: Yes, it does. Please check it out here to see how it works: https://ione-01.myshopify.com/products/30-degree-lamp?variant=26458864263

Home2.custom_tab_content:
Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.

Home3.subtitlefaq_page: Below FAQ are some common concerns of our clients before purchasing the theme, if you have other questions, please just send it to hello@cleversof.co
Home3.subtitlefaq_1: Will your template be fully compatible with Shopify?
Home3.subtitlefaq_2: I cannot upload the theme to my Shopify store / Shopify alerts that the file is too big to upload, what is the problem?
Home3.contentfaq_2:
1/ Download the package from themeforest.net (the file is in zip format)

2/ Extract the file you've just downloaded.

3/ Find this file from the extracted data: ione_theme_package_1_0_X.zip, then you just need to upload this file to your Shopify store.
Home3.subtitlefaq_3: What I have to do when I need your support?
Home3.contentfaq_3:
To save your time and reach our support quickly, please follow below steps:

1/ Create a staff account for us (with Themes permission and Settings permission) http://docs.shopify.com/manual/settings/account/staff-members

2/ Capture screenshot or video for the issue you get.

3/ Specify which template and version you are using.

4/ Describe clearly how to reproduce the issue.

5/ Send all information (staff account, screenshot, video, template name and version, description of the issues, link) to hello@cleversoft.co
Home3.subtitlefaq_4: Would assistance be available to upload the template if needed?
Home3.contentfaq_4: Yes, we will assist you to install the template if needed
Home3.subtitlefaq_5: Do you guys offer customisation services for your themes?
Home3.contentfaq_5: Yes, we do. Please send your customisation requests to hello@cleversoft.co, we will give you our quote. Thank you.
Home3.subtitlefaq_6: Can I turn on/off Lazy Loading Image / Item Animation / Fade Up on the page?
Home3.contentfaq_6: Yes. You can turn on/off the animation in the Setting page.
Home3.subtitlefaq_7: Can I turn on/off some blocks on the page?
Home3.contentfaq_7: Yes. You can turn on/off almost any blocks on the page (featured products, slideshow, banners, related products, recent products,...).
Home3.subtitlefaq_8: I want to have the dropdown cart displayed automatically every time clients hover over it (instead of clicking on it). Is it possible?
Home3.contentfaq_8: Yes, we have a setting for you to switch between these two options: Display on Hover and Display on Click.
Home3.subtitlefaq_9: What is included in the theme package?
Home3.contentfaq_9: The theme package includes theme source, Photoshop design files, sample data and manual guide.
Home3.subtitlefaq_10: I notice that the images used in the theme are all portrait. Will that be a problem if I use square images for our products? How will they be displayed in the theme?
Home3.contentfaq_10: That is not a problem. You just need to modify the width/height ratio in theme settings.
Home3.subtitlefaq_11: Does the theme support image resizing and cropping?
Home3.contentfaq_11: Yes. Normally, the theme will resize images to a default size (based on your width/height ratio setting). We also have Crop setting if you don’t want to scale the image.
Home3.subtitlefaq_12: Can I add borders around our product images?
Home3.contentfaq_12: Yes, you can. You can also set image border colours.
Home3.subtitlefaq_13: Can I have multi level menu?
Home3.contentfaq_13: Yes, you can. Just simply follow the instructions in our Manual Guide, you will be able to easily create a multi-level menu.
Home3.subtitlefaq_14: Do you guys provide customer support during weekends / holidays?
Home3.contentfaq_14: Normally we don't provide support during weekends, except for urgent cases. In these cases, you only need to mark “Urgent” in your email, we will get back to you ASAP.
Home3.subtitlefaq_15: Does the theme support Variant Image?
Home3.contentfaq_15: Yes, it does. Please check it out here to see how it works: https://ione-01.myshopify.com/products/30-degree-lamp?variant=26458864263

Home3.custom_tab_content:
Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.

Home4.subtitlefaq_page: Below FAQ are some common concerns of our clients before purchasing the theme, if you have other questions, please just send it to hello@cleversof.co
Home4.subtitlefaq_1: Will your template be fully compatible with Shopify?
Home4.subtitlefaq_2: I cannot upload the theme to my Shopify store / Shopify alerts that the file is too big to upload, what is the problem?
Home4.contentfaq_2:
1/ Download the package from themeforest.net (the file is in zip format)

2/ Extract the file you've just downloaded.

3/ Find this file from the extracted data: ione_theme_package_1_0_X.zip, then you just need to upload this file to your Shopify store.
Home4.subtitlefaq_3: What I have to do when I need your support?
Home4.contentfaq_3:
To save your time and reach our support quickly, please follow below steps:

1/ Create a staff account for us (with Themes permission and Settings permission) http://docs.shopify.com/manual/settings/account/staff-members

2/ Capture screenshot or video for the issue you get.

3/ Specify which template and version you are using.

4/ Describe clearly how to reproduce the issue.

5/ Send all information (staff account, screenshot, video, template name and version, description of the issues, link) to hello@cleversoft.co
Home4.subtitlefaq_4: Would assistance be available to upload the template if needed?
Home4.contentfaq_4: Yes, we will assist you to install the template if needed
Home4.subtitlefaq_5: Do you guys offer customisation services for your themes?
Home4.contentfaq_5: Yes, we do. Please send your customisation requests to hello@cleversoft.co, we will give you our quote. Thank you.
Home4.subtitlefaq_6: Can I turn on/off Lazy Loading Image / Item Animation / Fade Up on the page?
Home4.contentfaq_6: Yes. You can turn on/off the animation in the Setting page.
Home4.subtitlefaq_7: Can I turn on/off some blocks on the page?
Home4.contentfaq_7: Yes. You can turn on/off almost any blocks on the page (featured products, slideshow, banners, related products, recent products,...).
Home4.subtitlefaq_8: I want to have the dropdown cart displayed automatically every time clients hover over it (instead of clicking on it). Is it possible?
Home4.contentfaq_8: Yes, we have a setting for you to switch between these two options: Display on Hover and Display on Click.
Home4.subtitlefaq_9: What is included in the theme package?
Home4.contentfaq_9: The theme package includes theme source, Photoshop design files, sample data and manual guide.
Home4.subtitlefaq_10: I notice that the images used in the theme are all portrait. Will that be a problem if I use square images for our products? How will they be displayed in the theme?
Home4.contentfaq_10: That is not a problem. You just need to modify the width/height ratio in theme settings.
Home4.subtitlefaq_11: Does the theme support image resizing and cropping?
Home4.contentfaq_11: Yes. Normally, the theme will resize images to a default size (based on your width/height ratio setting). We also have Crop setting if you don’t want to scale the image.
Home4.subtitlefaq_12: Can I add borders around our product images?
Home4.contentfaq_12: Yes, you can. You can also set image border colours.
Home4.subtitlefaq_13: Can I have multi level menu?
Home4.contentfaq_13: Yes, you can. Just simply follow the instructions in our Manual Guide, you will be able to easily create a multi-level menu.
Home4.subtitlefaq_14: Do you guys provide customer support during weekends / holidays?
Home4.contentfaq_14: Normally we don't provide support during weekends, except for urgent cases. In these cases, you only need to mark “Urgent” in your email, we will get back to you ASAP.
Home4.subtitlefaq_15: Does the theme support Variant Image?
Home4.contentfaq_15: Yes, it does. Please check it out here to see how it works: https://ione-01.myshopify.com/products/30-degree-lamp?variant=26458864263

Home4.custom_tab_content:
Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.

Home5.subtitlefaq_page: Below FAQ are some common concerns of our clients before purchasing the theme, if you have other questions, please just send it to hello@cleversof.co
Home5.subtitlefaq_1: Will your template be fully compatible with Shopify?
Home5.subtitlefaq_2: I cannot upload the theme to my Shopify store / Shopify alerts that the file is too big to upload, what is the problem?
Home5.contentfaq_2:
1/ Download the package from themeforest.net (the file is in zip format)

2/ Extract the file you've just downloaded.

3/ Find this file from the extracted data: ione_theme_package_1_0_X.zip, then you just need to upload this file to your Shopify store.
Home5.subtitlefaq_3: What I have to do when I need your support?
Home5.contentfaq_3:
To save your time and reach our support quickly, please follow below steps:

1/ Create a staff account for us (with Themes permission and Settings permission) http://docs.shopify.com/manual/settings/account/staff-members

2/ Capture screenshot or video for the issue you get.

3/ Specify which template and version you are using.

4/ Describe clearly how to reproduce the issue.

5/ Send all information (staff account, screenshot, video, template name and version, description of the issues, link) to hello@cleversoft.co
Home5.subtitlefaq_4: Would assistance be available to upload the template if needed?
Home5.contentfaq_4: Yes, we will assist you to install the template if needed
Home5.subtitlefaq_5: Do you guys offer customisation services for your themes?
Home5.contentfaq_5: Yes, we do. Please send your customisation requests to hello@cleversoft.co, we will give you our quote. Thank you.
Home5.subtitlefaq_6: Can I turn on/off Lazy Loading Image / Item Animation / Fade Up on the page?
Home5.contentfaq_6: Yes. You can turn on/off the animation in the Setting page.
Home5.subtitlefaq_7: Can I turn on/off some blocks on the page?
Home5.contentfaq_7: Yes. You can turn on/off almost any blocks on the page (featured products, slideshow, banners, related products, recent products,...).
Home5.subtitlefaq_8: I want to have the dropdown cart displayed automatically every time clients hover over it (instead of clicking on it). Is it possible?
Home5.contentfaq_8: Yes, we have a setting for you to switch between these two options: Display on Hover and Display on Click.
Home5.subtitlefaq_9: What is included in the theme package?
Home5.contentfaq_9: The theme package includes theme source, Photoshop design files, sample data and manual guide.
Home5.subtitlefaq_10: I notice that the images used in the theme are all portrait. Will that be a problem if I use square images for our products? How will they be displayed in the theme?
Home5.contentfaq_10: That is not a problem. You just need to modify the width/height ratio in theme settings.
Home5.subtitlefaq_11: Does the theme support image resizing and cropping?
Home5.contentfaq_11: Yes. Normally, the theme will resize images to a default size (based on your width/height ratio setting). We also have Crop setting if you don’t want to scale the image.
Home5.subtitlefaq_12: Can I add borders around our product images?
Home5.contentfaq_12: Yes, you can. You can also set image border colours.
Home5.subtitlefaq_13: Can I have multi level menu?
Home5.contentfaq_13: Yes, you can. Just simply follow the instructions in our Manual Guide, you will be able to easily create a multi-level menu.
Home5.subtitlefaq_14: Do you guys provide customer support during weekends / holidays?
Home5.contentfaq_14: Normally we don't provide support during weekends, except for urgent cases. In these cases, you only need to mark “Urgent” in your email, we will get back to you ASAP.
Home5.subtitlefaq_15: Does the theme support Variant Image?
Home5.contentfaq_15: Yes, it does. Please check it out here to see how it works: https://ione-01.myshopify.com/products/30-degree-lamp?variant=26458864263

Home5.custom_tab_content:
Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.

Home6.subtitlefaq_page: Below FAQ are some common concerns of our clients before purchasing the theme, if you have other questions, please just send it to hello@cleversof.co
Home6.subtitlefaq_1: Will your template be fully compatible with Shopify?
Home6.subtitlefaq_2: I cannot upload the theme to my Shopify store / Shopify alerts that the file is too big to upload, what is the problem?
Home6.contentfaq_2:
1/ Download the package from themeforest.net (the file is in zip format)

2/ Extract the file you've just downloaded.

3/ Find this file from the extracted data: ione_theme_package_1_0_X.zip, then you just need to upload this file to your Shopify store.
Home6.subtitlefaq_3: What I have to do when I need your support?
Home6.contentfaq_3:
To save your time and reach our support quickly, please follow below steps:

1/ Create a staff account for us (with Themes permission and Settings permission) http://docs.shopify.com/manual/settings/account/staff-members

2/ Capture screenshot or video for the issue you get.

3/ Specify which template and version you are using.

4/ Describe clearly how to reproduce the issue.

5/ Send all information (staff account, screenshot, video, template name and version, description of the issues, link) to hello@cleversoft.co
Home6.subtitlefaq_4: Would assistance be available to upload the template if needed?
Home6.contentfaq_4: Yes, we will assist you to install the template if needed
Home6.subtitlefaq_5: Do you guys offer customisation services for your themes?
Home6.contentfaq_5: Yes, we do. Please send your customisation requests to hello@cleversoft.co, we will give you our quote. Thank you.
Home6.subtitlefaq_6: Can I turn on/off Lazy Loading Image / Item Animation / Fade Up on the page?
Home6.contentfaq_6: Yes. You can turn on/off the animation in the Setting page.
Home6.subtitlefaq_7: Can I turn on/off some blocks on the page?
Home6.contentfaq_7: Yes. You can turn on/off almost any blocks on the page (featured products, slideshow, banners, related products, recent products,...).
Home6.subtitlefaq_8: I want to have the dropdown cart displayed automatically every time clients hover over it (instead of clicking on it). Is it possible?
Home6.contentfaq_8: Yes, we have a setting for you to switch between these two options: Display on Hover and Display on Click.
Home6.subtitlefaq_9: What is included in the theme package?
Home6.contentfaq_9: The theme package includes theme source, Photoshop design files, sample data and manual guide.
Home6.subtitlefaq_10: I notice that the images used in the theme are all portrait. Will that be a problem if I use square images for our products? How will they be displayed in the theme?
Home6.contentfaq_10: That is not a problem. You just need to modify the width/height ratio in theme settings.
Home6.subtitlefaq_11: Does the theme support image resizing and cropping?
Home6.contentfaq_11: Yes. Normally, the theme will resize images to a default size (based on your width/height ratio setting). We also have Crop setting if you don’t want to scale the image.
Home6.subtitlefaq_12: Can I add borders around our product images?
Home6.contentfaq_12: Yes, you can. You can also set image border colours.
Home6.subtitlefaq_13: Can I have multi level menu?
Home6.contentfaq_13: Yes, you can. Just simply follow the instructions in our Manual Guide, you will be able to easily create a multi-level menu.
Home6.subtitlefaq_14: Do you guys provide customer support during weekends / holidays?
Home6.contentfaq_14: Normally we don't provide support during weekends, except for urgent cases. In these cases, you only need to mark “Urgent” in your email, we will get back to you ASAP.
Home6.subtitlefaq_15: Does the theme support Variant Image?
Home6.contentfaq_15: Yes, it does. Please check it out here to see how it works: https://ione-01.myshopify.com/products/30-degree-lamp?variant=26458864263

Home6.custom_tab_content:
Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.

Home7.subtitlefaq_page: Below FAQ are some common concerns of our clients before purchasing the theme, if you have other questions, please just send it to hello@cleversof.co
Home7.subtitlefaq_1: Will your template be fully compatible with Shopify?
Home7.subtitlefaq_2: I cannot upload the theme to my Shopify store / Shopify alerts that the file is too big to upload, what is the problem?
Home7.contentfaq_2:
1/ Download the package from themeforest.net (the file is in zip format)

2/ Extract the file you've just downloaded.

3/ Find this file from the extracted data: ione_theme_package_1_0_X.zip, then you just need to upload this file to your Shopify store.
Home7.subtitlefaq_3: What I have to do when I need your support?
Home7.contentfaq_3:
To save your time and reach our support quickly, please follow below steps:

1/ Create a staff account for us (with Themes permission and Settings permission) http://docs.shopify.com/manual/settings/account/staff-members

2/ Capture screenshot or video for the issue you get.

3/ Specify which template and version you are using.

4/ Describe clearly how to reproduce the issue.

5/ Send all information (staff account, screenshot, video, template name and version, description of the issues, link) to hello@cleversoft.co
Home7.subtitlefaq_4: Would assistance be available to upload the template if needed?
Home7.contentfaq_4: Yes, we will assist you to install the template if needed
Home7.subtitlefaq_5: Do you guys offer customisation services for your themes?
Home7.contentfaq_5: Yes, we do. Please send your customisation requests to hello@cleversoft.co, we will give you our quote. Thank you.
Home7.subtitlefaq_6: Can I turn on/off Lazy Loading Image / Item Animation / Fade Up on the page?
Home7.contentfaq_6: Yes. You can turn on/off the animation in the Setting page.
Home7.subtitlefaq_7: Can I turn on/off some blocks on the page?
Home7.contentfaq_7: Yes. You can turn on/off almost any blocks on the page (featured products, slideshow, banners, related products, recent products,...).
Home7.subtitlefaq_8: I want to have the dropdown cart displayed automatically every time clients hover over it (instead of clicking on it). Is it possible?
Home7.contentfaq_8: Yes, we have a setting for you to switch between these two options: Display on Hover and Display on Click.
Home7.subtitlefaq_9: What is included in the theme package?
Home7.contentfaq_9: The theme package includes theme source, Photoshop design files, sample data and manual guide.
Home7.subtitlefaq_10: I notice that the images used in the theme are all portrait. Will that be a problem if I use square images for our products? How will they be displayed in the theme?
Home7.contentfaq_10: That is not a problem. You just need to modify the width/height ratio in theme settings.
Home7.subtitlefaq_11: Does the theme support image resizing and cropping?
Home7.contentfaq_11: Yes. Normally, the theme will resize images to a default size (based on your width/height ratio setting). We also have Crop setting if you don’t want to scale the image.
Home7.subtitlefaq_12: Can I add borders around our product images?
Home7.contentfaq_12: Yes, you can. You can also set image border colours.
Home7.subtitlefaq_13: Can I have multi level menu?
Home7.contentfaq_13: Yes, you can. Just simply follow the instructions in our Manual Guide, you will be able to easily create a multi-level menu.
Home7.subtitlefaq_14: Do you guys provide customer support during weekends / holidays?
Home7.contentfaq_14: Normally we don't provide support during weekends, except for urgent cases. In these cases, you only need to mark “Urgent” in your email, we will get back to you ASAP.
Home7.subtitlefaq_15: Does the theme support Variant Image?
Home7.contentfaq_15: Yes, it does. Please check it out here to see how it works: https://ione-01.myshopify.com/products/30-degree-lamp?variant=26458864263

Home7.custom_tab_content:
Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.

Home8.subtitlefaq_page: Below FAQ are some common concerns of our clients before purchasing the theme, if you have other questions, please just send it to hello@cleversof.co
Home8.subtitlefaq_1: Will your template be fully compatible with Shopify?
Home8.subtitlefaq_2: I cannot upload the theme to my Shopify store / Shopify alerts that the file is too big to upload, what is the problem?
Home8.contentfaq_2:
1/ Download the package from themeforest.net (the file is in zip format)

2/ Extract the file you've just downloaded.

3/ Find this file from the extracted data: ione_theme_package_1_0_X.zip, then you just need to upload this file to your Shopify store.
Home8.subtitlefaq_3: What I have to do when I need your support?
Home8.contentfaq_3:
To save your time and reach our support quickly, please follow below steps:

1/ Create a staff account for us (with Themes permission and Settings permission) http://docs.shopify.com/manual/settings/account/staff-members

2/ Capture screenshot or video for the issue you get.

3/ Specify which template and version you are using.

4/ Describe clearly how to reproduce the issue.

5/ Send all information (staff account, screenshot, video, template name and version, description of the issues, link) to hello@cleversoft.co
Home8.subtitlefaq_4: Would assistance be available to upload the template if needed?
Home8.contentfaq_4: Yes, we will assist you to install the template if needed
Home8.subtitlefaq_5: Do you guys offer customisation services for your themes?
Home8.contentfaq_5: Yes, we do. Please send your customisation requests to hello@cleversoft.co, we will give you our quote. Thank you.
Home8.subtitlefaq_6: Can I turn on/off Lazy Loading Image / Item Animation / Fade Up on the page?
Home8.contentfaq_6: Yes. You can turn on/off the animation in the Setting page.
Home8.subtitlefaq_7: Can I turn on/off some blocks on the page?
Home8.contentfaq_7: Yes. You can turn on/off almost any blocks on the page (featured products, slideshow, banners, related products, recent products,...).
Home8.subtitlefaq_8: I want to have the dropdown cart displayed automatically every time clients hover over it (instead of clicking on it). Is it possible?
Home8.contentfaq_8: Yes, we have a setting for you to switch between these two options: Display on Hover and Display on Click.
Home8.subtitlefaq_9: What is included in the theme package?
Home8.contentfaq_9: The theme package includes theme source, Photoshop design files, sample data and manual guide.
Home8.subtitlefaq_10: I notice that the images used in the theme are all portrait. Will that be a problem if I use square images for our products? How will they be displayed in the theme?
Home8.contentfaq_10: That is not a problem. You just need to modify the width/height ratio in theme settings.
Home8.subtitlefaq_11: Does the theme support image resizing and cropping?
Home8.contentfaq_11: Yes. Normally, the theme will resize images to a default size (based on your width/height ratio setting). We also have Crop setting if you don’t want to scale the image.
Home8.subtitlefaq_12: Can I add borders around our product images?
Home8.contentfaq_12: Yes, you can. You can also set image border colours.
Home8.subtitlefaq_13: Can I have multi level menu?
Home8.contentfaq_13: Yes, you can. Just simply follow the instructions in our Manual Guide, you will be able to easily create a multi-level menu.
Home8.subtitlefaq_14: Do you guys provide customer support during weekends / holidays?
Home8.contentfaq_14: Normally we don't provide support during weekends, except for urgent cases. In these cases, you only need to mark “Urgent” in your email, we will get back to you ASAP.
Home8.subtitlefaq_15: Does the theme support Variant Image?
Home8.contentfaq_15: Yes, it does. Please check it out here to see how it works: https://ione-01.myshopify.com/products/30-degree-lamp?variant=26458864263

Home8.custom_tab_content:
Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.

Home9.subtitlefaq_page: Below FAQ are some common concerns of our clients before purchasing the theme, if you have other questions, please just send it to hello@cleversof.co
Home9.subtitlefaq_1: Will your template be fully compatible with Shopify?
Home9.subtitlefaq_2: I cannot upload the theme to my Shopify store / Shopify alerts that the file is too big to upload, what is the problem?
Home9.contentfaq_2:
1/ Download the package from themeforest.net (the file is in zip format)

2/ Extract the file you've just downloaded.

3/ Find this file from the extracted data: ione_theme_package_1_0_X.zip, then you just need to upload this file to your Shopify store.
Home9.subtitlefaq_3: What I have to do when I need your support?
Home9.contentfaq_3:
To save your time and reach our support quickly, please follow below steps:

1/ Create a staff account for us (with Themes permission and Settings permission) http://docs.shopify.com/manual/settings/account/staff-members

2/ Capture screenshot or video for the issue you get.

3/ Specify which template and version you are using.

4/ Describe clearly how to reproduce the issue.

5/ Send all information (staff account, screenshot, video, template name and version, description of the issues, link) to hello@cleversoft.co
Home9.subtitlefaq_4: Would assistance be available to upload the template if needed?
Home9.contentfaq_4: Yes, we will assist you to install the template if needed
Home9.subtitlefaq_5: Do you guys offer customisation services for your themes?
Home9.contentfaq_5: Yes, we do. Please send your customisation requests to hello@cleversoft.co, we will give you our quote. Thank you.
Home9.subtitlefaq_6: Can I turn on/off Lazy Loading Image / Item Animation / Fade Up on the page?
Home9.contentfaq_6: Yes. You can turn on/off the animation in the Setting page.
Home9.subtitlefaq_7: Can I turn on/off some blocks on the page?
Home9.contentfaq_7: Yes. You can turn on/off almost any blocks on the page (featured products, slideshow, banners, related products, recent products,...).
Home9.subtitlefaq_8: I want to have the dropdown cart displayed automatically every time clients hover over it (instead of clicking on it). Is it possible?
Home9.contentfaq_8: Yes, we have a setting for you to switch between these two options: Display on Hover and Display on Click.
Home9.subtitlefaq_9: What is included in the theme package?
Home9.contentfaq_9: The theme package includes theme source, Photoshop design files, sample data and manual guide.
Home9.subtitlefaq_10: I notice that the images used in the theme are all portrait. Will that be a problem if I use square images for our products? How will they be displayed in the theme?
Home9.contentfaq_10: That is not a problem. You just need to modify the width/height ratio in theme settings.
Home9.subtitlefaq_11: Does the theme support image resizing and cropping?
Home9.contentfaq_11: Yes. Normally, the theme will resize images to a default size (based on your width/height ratio setting). We also have Crop setting if you don’t want to scale the image.
Home9.subtitlefaq_12: Can I add borders around our product images?
Home9.contentfaq_12: Yes, you can. You can also set image border colours.
Home9.subtitlefaq_13: Can I have multi level menu?
Home9.contentfaq_13: Yes, you can. Just simply follow the instructions in our Manual Guide, you will be able to easily create a multi-level menu.
Home9.subtitlefaq_14: Do you guys provide customer support during weekends / holidays?
Home9.contentfaq_14: Normally we don't provide support during weekends, except for urgent cases. In these cases, you only need to mark “Urgent” in your email, we will get back to you ASAP.
Home9.subtitlefaq_15: Does the theme support Variant Image?
Home9.contentfaq_15: Yes, it does. Please check it out here to see how it works: https://ione-01.myshopify.com/products/30-degree-lamp?variant=26458864263

Home9.custom_tab_content:
Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.

Home10.subtitlefaq_page: Below FAQ are some common concerns of our clients before purchasing the theme, if you have other questions, please just send it to hello@cleversof.co
Home10.subtitlefaq_1: Will your template be fully compatible with Shopify?
Home10.subtitlefaq_2: I cannot upload the theme to my Shopify store / Shopify alerts that the file is too big to upload, what is the problem?
Home10.contentfaq_2:
1/ Download the package from themeforest.net (the file is in zip format)

2/ Extract the file you've just downloaded.

3/ Find this file from the extracted data: ione_theme_package_1_0_X.zip, then you just need to upload this file to your Shopify store.
Home10.subtitlefaq_3: What I have to do when I need your support?
Home10.contentfaq_3:
To save your time and reach our support quickly, please follow below steps:

1/ Create a staff account for us (with Themes permission and Settings permission) http://docs.shopify.com/manual/settings/account/staff-members

2/ Capture screenshot or video for the issue you get.

3/ Specify which template and version you are using.

4/ Describe clearly how to reproduce the issue.

5/ Send all information (staff account, screenshot, video, template name and version, description of the issues, link) to hello@cleversoft.co
Home10.subtitlefaq_4: Would assistance be available to upload the template if needed?
Home10.contentfaq_4: Yes, we will assist you to install the template if needed
Home10.subtitlefaq_5: Do you guys offer customisation services for your themes?
Home10.contentfaq_5: Yes, we do. Please send your customisation requests to hello@cleversoft.co, we will give you our quote. Thank you.
Home10.subtitlefaq_6: Can I turn on/off Lazy Loading Image / Item Animation / Fade Up on the page?
Home10.contentfaq_6: Yes. You can turn on/off the animation in the Setting page.
Home10.subtitlefaq_7: Can I turn on/off some blocks on the page?
Home10.contentfaq_7: Yes. You can turn on/off almost any blocks on the page (featured products, slideshow, banners, related products, recent products,...).
Home10.subtitlefaq_8: I want to have the dropdown cart displayed automatically every time clients hover over it (instead of clicking on it). Is it possible?
Home10.contentfaq_8: Yes, we have a setting for you to switch between these two options: Display on Hover and Display on Click.
Home10.subtitlefaq_9: What is included in the theme package?
Home10.contentfaq_9: The theme package includes theme source, Photoshop design files, sample data and manual guide.
Home10.subtitlefaq_10: I notice that the images used in the theme are all portrait. Will that be a problem if I use square images for our products? How will they be displayed in the theme?
Home10.contentfaq_10: That is not a problem. You just need to modify the width/height ratio in theme settings.
Home10.subtitlefaq_11: Does the theme support image resizing and cropping?
Home10.contentfaq_11: Yes. Normally, the theme will resize images to a default size (based on your width/height ratio setting). We also have Crop setting if you don’t want to scale the image.
Home10.subtitlefaq_12: Can I add borders around our product images?
Home10.contentfaq_12: Yes, you can. You can also set image border colours.
Home10.subtitlefaq_13: Can I have multi level menu?
Home10.contentfaq_13: Yes, you can. Just simply follow the instructions in our Manual Guide, you will be able to easily create a multi-level menu.
Home10.subtitlefaq_14: Do you guys provide customer support during weekends / holidays?
Home10.contentfaq_14: Normally we don't provide support during weekends, except for urgent cases. In these cases, you only need to mark “Urgent” in your email, we will get back to you ASAP.
Home10.subtitlefaq_15: Does the theme support Variant Image?
Home10.contentfaq_15: Yes, it does. Please check it out here to see how it works: https://ione-01.myshopify.com/products/30-degree-lamp?variant=26458864263

Home10.custom_tab_content:
Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.

Home11.subtitlefaq_page: Below FAQ are some common concerns of our clients before purchasing the theme, if you have other questions, please just send it to hello@cleversof.co
Home11.subtitlefaq_1: Will your template be fully compatible with Shopify?
Home11.subtitlefaq_2: I cannot upload the theme to my Shopify store / Shopify alerts that the file is too big to upload, what is the problem?
Home11.contentfaq_2:
1/ Download the package from themeforest.net (the file is in zip format)

2/ Extract the file you've just downloaded.

3/ Find this file from the extracted data: ione_theme_package_1_0_X.zip, then you just need to upload this file to your Shopify store.
Home11.subtitlefaq_3: What I have to do when I need your support?
Home11.contentfaq_3:
To save your time and reach our support quickly, please follow below steps:

1/ Create a staff account for us (with Themes permission and Settings permission) http://docs.shopify.com/manual/settings/account/staff-members

2/ Capture screenshot or video for the issue you get.

3/ Specify which template and version you are using.

4/ Describe clearly how to reproduce the issue.

5/ Send all information (staff account, screenshot, video, template name and version, description of the issues, link) to hello@cleversoft.co
Home11.subtitlefaq_4: Would assistance be available to upload the template if needed?
Home11.contentfaq_4: Yes, we will assist you to install the template if needed
Home11.subtitlefaq_5: Do you guys offer customisation services for your themes?
Home11.contentfaq_5: Yes, we do. Please send your customisation requests to hello@cleversoft.co, we will give you our quote. Thank you.
Home11.subtitlefaq_6: Can I turn on/off Lazy Loading Image / Item Animation / Fade Up on the page?
Home11.contentfaq_6: Yes. You can turn on/off the animation in the Setting page.
Home11.subtitlefaq_7: Can I turn on/off some blocks on the page?
Home11.contentfaq_7: Yes. You can turn on/off almost any blocks on the page (featured products, slideshow, banners, related products, recent products,...).
Home11.subtitlefaq_8: I want to have the dropdown cart displayed automatically every time clients hover over it (instead of clicking on it). Is it possible?
Home11.contentfaq_8: Yes, we have a setting for you to switch between these two options: Display on Hover and Display on Click.
Home11.subtitlefaq_9: What is included in the theme package?
Home11.contentfaq_9: The theme package includes theme source, Photoshop design files, sample data and manual guide.
Home11.subtitlefaq_10: I notice that the images used in the theme are all portrait. Will that be a problem if I use square images for our products? How will they be displayed in the theme?
Home11.contentfaq_10: That is not a problem. You just need to modify the width/height ratio in theme settings.
Home11.subtitlefaq_11: Does the theme support image resizing and cropping?
Home11.contentfaq_11: Yes. Normally, the theme will resize images to a default size (based on your width/height ratio setting). We also have Crop setting if you don’t want to scale the image.
Home11.subtitlefaq_12: Can I add borders around our product images?
Home11.contentfaq_12: Yes, you can. You can also set image border colours.
Home11.subtitlefaq_13: Can I have multi level menu?
Home11.contentfaq_13: Yes, you can. Just simply follow the instructions in our Manual Guide, you will be able to easily create a multi-level menu.
Home11.subtitlefaq_14: Do you guys provide customer support during weekends / holidays?
Home11.contentfaq_14: Normally we don't provide support during weekends, except for urgent cases. In these cases, you only need to mark “Urgent” in your email, we will get back to you ASAP.
Home11.subtitlefaq_15: Does the theme support Variant Image?
Home11.contentfaq_15: Yes, it does. Please check it out here to see how it works: https://ione-01.myshopify.com/products/30-degree-lamp?variant=26458864263

Home11.custom_tab_content:
Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.

  • Left and right anatomical design

Home12.subtitlefaq_page: Below FAQ are some common concerns of our clients before purchasing the theme, if you have other questions, please just send it to hello@cleversof.co
Home12.subtitlefaq_1: Will your template be fully compatible with Shopify?
Home12.subtitlefaq_2: I cannot upload the theme to my Shopify store / Shopify alerts that the file is too big to upload, what is the problem?
Home12.contentfaq_2:
1/ Download the package from themeforest.net (the file is in zip format)

2/ Extract the file you've just downloaded.

3/ Find this file from the extracted data: ione_theme_package_1_0_X.zip, then you just need to upload this file to your Shopify store.
Home12.subtitlefaq_3: What I have to do when I need your support?
Home12.contentfaq_3:
To save your time and reach our support quickly, please follow below steps:

1/ Create a staff account for us (with Themes permission and Settings permission) http://docs.shopify.com/manual/settings/account/staff-members

2/ Capture screenshot or video for the issue you get.

3/ Specify which template and version you are using.

4/ Describe clearly how to reproduce the issue.

5/ Send all information (staff account, screenshot, video, template name and version, description of the issues, link) to hello@cleversoft.co
Home12.subtitlefaq_4: Would assistance be available to upload the template if needed?
Home12.contentfaq_4: Yes, we will assist you to install the template if needed
Home12.subtitlefaq_5: Do you guys offer customisation services for your themes?
Home12.contentfaq_5: Yes, we do. Please send your customisation requests to hello@cleversoft.co, we will give you our quote. Thank you.
Home12.subtitlefaq_6: Can I turn on/off Lazy Loading Image / Item Animation / Fade Up on the page?
Home12.contentfaq_6: Yes. You can turn on/off the animation in the Setting page.
Home12.subtitlefaq_7: Can I turn on/off some blocks on the page?
Home12.contentfaq_7: Yes. You can turn on/off almost any blocks on the page (featured products, slideshow, banners, related products, recent products,...).
Home12.subtitlefaq_8: I want to have the dropdown cart displayed automatically every time clients hover over it (instead of clicking on it). Is it possible?
Home12.contentfaq_8: Yes, we have a setting for you to switch between these two options: Display on Hover and Display on Click.
Home12.subtitlefaq_9: What is included in the theme package?
Home12.contentfaq_9: The theme package includes theme source, Photoshop design files, sample data and manual guide.
Home12.subtitlefaq_10: I notice that the images used in the theme are all portrait. Will that be a problem if I use square images for our products? How will they be displayed in the theme?
Home12.contentfaq_10: That is not a problem. You just need to modify the width/height ratio in theme settings.
Home12.subtitlefaq_11: Does the theme support image resizing and cropping?
Home12.contentfaq_11: Yes. Normally, the theme will resize images to a default size (based on your width/height ratio setting). We also have Crop setting if you don’t want to scale the image.
Home12.subtitlefaq_12: Can I add borders around our product images?
Home12.contentfaq_12: Yes, you can. You can also set image border colours.
Home12.subtitlefaq_13: Can I have multi level menu?
Home12.contentfaq_13: Yes, you can. Just simply follow the instructions in our Manual Guide, you will be able to easily create a multi-level menu.
Home12.subtitlefaq_14: Do you guys provide customer support during weekends / holidays?
Home12.contentfaq_14: Normally we don't provide support during weekends, except for urgent cases. In these cases, you only need to mark “Urgent” in your email, we will get back to you ASAP.
Home12.subtitlefaq_15: Does the theme support Variant Image?
Home12.contentfaq_15: Yes, it does. Please check it out here to see how it works: https://ione-01.myshopify.com/products/30-degree-lamp?variant=26458864263

Home12.custom_tab_content:
Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.
